refnamediv.refpurpose: Functions for shape engines to manipulate FreeType fonts

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The macros and functions in this section are used to access fonts and render text to bitmaps using the FreeType 2 library.

refsect2.title: PangoFT2FontMap
refsect2.para: The PangoFT2FontMap is the PangoFontMap implementation for FreeType fonts.

refsect2.title: PANGO_RENDER_TYPE_FT2

warning.para: PANGO_RENDER_TYPE_FT2 is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: A string constant that was used to identify shape engines that work with the FreeType backend. See PANGO_RENDER_TYPE_FC for the replacement.

refsect2.title: pango_ft2_font_map_new ()
refsect2.para: Create a new PangoFT2FontMap object; a fontmap is used to cache information about available fonts, and holds certain global parameters such as the resolution and the default substitute function (see pango_ft2_font_map_set_default_substitute()).

listitem.simpara: the newly created fontmap object. Unref with g_object_unref() when you are finished with it.

refsect2.para: Since 1.2

refsect2.title: pango_ft2_font_map_set_resolution ()
refsect2.para: Sets the horizontal and vertical resolutions for the fontmap.

listitem.simpara: a PangoFT2Fontmap
dots per inch in the X direction
dots per inch in the Y direction

refsect2.para: Since 1.2

refsect2.title: pango_ft2_font_map_create_context ()
refsect2.para: Create a PangoContext for the given fontmap.

listitem.simpara: a PangoFT2Fontmap
the newly created context; free with g_object_unref().

refsect2.para: Since 1.2

refsect2.title: PangoFT2SubstituteFunc ()
refsect2.para: Function type for doing final config tweaking on prepared FcPatterns.

listitem.simpara: the FcPattern to tweak.
user data.

refsect2.title: pango_ft2_font_map_set_default_substitute ()
refsect2.programlisting: void pango_ft2_font_map_set_default_substitute (PangoFT2FontMap *fontmap, PangoFT2SubstituteFunc func, gpointer data, GDestroyNotify notify);
refsect2.para: Sets a function that will be called to do final configuration substitution on a FcPattern before it is used to load the font. This function can be used to do things like set hinting and antialiasing options.

listitem.simpara: a PangoFT2FontMap
function to call to to do final config tweaking on FcPattern objects.
data to pass to func
function to call when data is no longer used.

refsect2.para: Since 1.2

refsect2.title: pango_ft2_font_map_substitute_changed ()
refsect2.para: Call this function any time the results of the default substitution function set with pango_ft2_font_map_set_default_substitute() change. That is, if your substitution function will return different results for the same input pattern, you must call this function.

listitem.simpara: a PangoFT2Fontmap

refsect2.para: Since 1.2

refsect2.title: pango_ft2_get_context ()

warning.para: pango_ft2_get_context is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Retrieves a PangoContext for the default PangoFT2 fontmap (see pango_ft2_fontmap_get_for_display()) and sets the resolution for the default fontmap to dpi_x by dpi_y.
Use of this function is deprecated; see pango_ft2_fontmap_create_context() instead.

listitem.simpara: the horizontal DPI of the target device
the vertical DPI of the target device
the new PangoContext

refsect2.title: pango_ft2_render ()
refsect2.programlisting: void pango_ft2_render (FT_Bitmap *bitmap, PangoFont *font, PangoGlyphString *glyphs, gint x, gint y);
refsect2.para: Renders a PangoGlyphString onto a FreeType2 bitmap.

listitem.simpara: the FreeType2 bitmap onto which to draw the string
the font in which to draw the string
the glyph string to draw
the x position of the start of the string (in pixels)
the y position of the baseline (in pixels)

refsect2.title: pango_ft2_render_transformed ()
refsect2.programlisting: void pango_ft2_render_transformed (FT_Bitmap *bitmap, const PangoMatrix *matrix, PangoFont *font, PangoGlyphString *glyphs, int x, int y);
refsect2.para: Renders a PangoGlyphString onto a FreeType2 bitmap, possibly transforming the layed-out coordinates through a transformation matrix. Note that the transformation matrix for font is not changed, so to produce correct rendering results, the font must have been loaded using a PangoContext with an identical transformation matrix to that passed in to this function.

listitem.simpara: the FreeType2 bitmap onto which to draw the string
a PangoMatrix, or NULL to use an identity transformation
the font in which to draw the string
the glyph string to draw
the x position of the start of the string (in Pango units in user space coordinates)
the y position of the baseline (in Pango units in user space coordinates)

refsect2.para: Since 1.6

refsect2.programlisting: void pango_ft2_render_layout_line (FT_Bitmap *bitmap, PangoLayoutLine *line, int x, int y);
refsect2.para: Render a PangoLayoutLine onto a FreeType2 bitmap

listitem.simpara: a FT_Bitmap to render the line onto
a PangoLayoutLine
the x position of start of string (in pixels)
the y position of baseline (in pixels)

refsect2.title: pango_ft2_render_layout_line_subpixel ()
refsect2.programlisting: void pango_ft2_render_layout_line_subpixel (FT_Bitmap *bitmap, PangoLayoutLine *line, int x, int y);
refsect2.para: Render a PangoLayoutLine onto a FreeType2 bitmap, with he location specified in fixed-point Pango units rather than pixels. (Using this will avoid extra inaccuracies from rounding to integer pixels multiple times, even if the final glyph positions are integers.)

listitem.simpara: a FT_Bitmap to render the line onto
a PangoLayoutLine
the x position of start of string (in Pango units)
the y position of baseline (in Pango units)

refsect2.para: Since 1.6

refsect2.title: pango_ft2_get_unknown_glyph ()

warning.para: pango_ft2_get_unknown_glyph is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Return the index of a glyph suitable for drawing unknown characters with font, or PANGO_GLYPH_EMPTY if no suitable glyph found.
If you want to draw an unknown-box for a character that is not covered by the font, use PANGO_GET_UNKNOWN_GLYPH() instead.

listitem.simpara: a PangoFont
a glyph index into font, or PANGO_GLYPH_EMPTY

refsect2.title: pango_ft2_font_get_kerning ()

warning.para: pango_ft2_font_get_kerning is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Retrieves kerning information for a combination of two glyphs.
Use pango_fc_font_kern_glyphs() instead.

listitem.simpara: a PangoFont
the left PangoGlyph
the right PangoGlyph
The amount of kerning (in Pango units) to apply for the given combination of glyphs.

refsect2.title: pango_ft2_font_get_face ()

warning.para: pango_ft2_font_get_face is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Returns the native FreeType2 FT_Face structure used for this PangoFont. This may be useful if you want to use FreeType2 functions directly.
Use pango_fc_font_lock_face() instead; when you are done with a face from pango_fc_font_lock_face() you must call pango_fc_font_unlock_face().

listitem.simpara: a PangoFont
a pointer to a FT_Face structure, with the size set correctly

refsect2.title: pango_ft2_font_get_coverage ()

warning.para: pango_ft2_font_get_coverage is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Gets the PangoCoverage for a PangoFT2Font. Use pango_font_get_coverage() instead.

listitem.simpara: a PangoFT2Font.
a language tag.
a PangoCoverage.

refsect2.title: pango_ft2_font_map_for_display ()

warning.para: pango_ft2_font_map_for_display is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Returns a PangoFT2FontMap. This font map is cached and should not be freed. If the font map is no longer needed, it can be released with pango_ft2_shutdown_display(). Use of the global PangoFT2 fontmap is deprecated; use pango_ft2_font_map_new() instead.

listitem.simpara: a PangoFT2FontMap.

refsect2.title: pango_ft2_shutdown_display ()

warning.para: pango_ft2_shutdown_display is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Free the global fontmap. (See pango_ft2_font_map_for_display()) Use of the global PangoFT2 fontmap is deprecated.
